Ghostly troll throwers are monsters found inside of the City of Um troll cave, entry from the large cave opening on the south coast of the City of Um. There are seven of them residing within the cave alongside with seven ghostly troll bruisers and various other ghostly troll characters.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100% drop
    • 1.2 Main drops
  • 2 Transcript
  • 3 Achievements
  • 4 Update history

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations and other messaging related to this NPC.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • And They Called Him Weapon Poison+++ ( 5) – Kill a ghostly troll with Necromancy in the cave entrance to Trollgrav.
